content:
The Limited Edition Disney Princess doll set sounds like a great addition to your collection! Since it's still in its original packaging and in perfect condition, it's definitely worth exploring its resale value.

Limited Edition Disney items, especially those that are still sealed and in mint condition, can retain their value or even appreciate over time. The fact that you got it as a pre-order and it's still in its original packaging adds to its collectibility.

The value of your Disney Princess doll set depends on several factors, such as:

1. Rarity: How many sets were produced, and is it a one-time release or a limited production run?
2. Demand: Are Disney Princess collectibles currently in high demand, and is this specific set sought after by collectors?
3. Condition: As you mentioned, the fact that it's still sealed and in perfect condition is a huge plus.
4. Age: Since you got it in February, it's still a relatively new release, which can affect its value.

Based on these factors, I'd estimate that your Limited Edition Disney Princess doll set could be worth anywhere from $100 to $300, depending on the demand and rarity of the set.

To get a better idea of its value, I recommend researching online marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, or specialized Disney collector forums. You can also check out Disney's official collector's edition releases and compare your set to others that have been released.

If you're considering selling your Disney Princess doll set, I'd suggest listing it on online marketplaces or specialized forums where collectors are actively looking for rare and limited edition Disney items. You can also consider reaching out to local collectible toy stores or Disney-themed shops to see if they're interested in purchasing it.

Remember to take high-quality photos of the set from multiple angles, and include detailed descriptions of its condition, packaging, and any certificates of authenticity. This will help attract potential buyers and increase the chances of selling it for a good price.
